name: Stop Wasting Food movement Denmark (Stop Spild Af Mad)
goal: Stop Wasting Food movement Denmark (Stop Spild Af Mad) is Denmark’s largest non-profit movement against food waste. Since 2008, Stop Wasting Food has massively contributed to bring food waste on Denmark’s agenda and achieved a large number of results in Denmark, EU and UN. Stop Wasting Food has started the fight against food waste in Denmark and brought Denmark’s fight against food waste on the world map. Since 2008, Stop Wasting Food has generated over 8,000 Danish and international media coverages. Stop Wasting Food has support of over 65,000 people, a number of leading top politicians, MP’s and MEP’s as well as Denmark’s former Prime Minister and acknowledged food personalities. Stop Wasting Food collaborates with many Danish and international stakeholders in the entire food value chain.
euInitiatives:
Stop Wasting Food was a Partner in EU FUSIONS
http://www.eu-fusions.org

Stop Wasting Food is a Member of European Commission’s EU Platform on Food Losses and Food Waste
https://ec.europa.eu/food/safety/food_waste/eu_actions/eu-platform/platform-members_en
